verbs.description: [ARG1: The Dow Jones] [ARGM-TMP: immediately] [V: fell] [ARG2: by almost 200 points] [ARGM-CAU: on news that President Trump has canceled the widely anticipated meeting with Kim Jong Un] .
The Dow Jones immediately fell by almost 200 points on news that President Trump [V: has] canceled the widely anticipated meeting with Kim Jong Un .
The Dow Jones immediately fell by almost 200 points on news that [ARG0: President Trump] has [V: canceled] [ARG1: the widely anticipated meeting with Kim Jong Un] .
The Dow Jones immediately fell by almost 200 points on news that President Trump has canceled the [ARGM-ADV: widely] [V: anticipated] [ARG1: meeting] with Kim Jong Un .
